page.shortlink: api string dictionary dot set function
page.description: Set a value to string dictionary.
page.syntax: Set as v(name as c,value as c)

argument.name: value
argument.description: Character data to be saved in the dictionary.

page.discussion: The .SET() method adds a new entry to a StringDictionary list.
page.example: dim sd as StringDictionary sd.set("abc", "3") ? sd.get("abc") = "3"
